author: Digital Foundry
description:
Thanks to Where Winds Meet for sponsoring this video. Learn more about the game here - Steam: https://bit.ly/4pejoIN and the official website: https://bit.ly/48bzcWS

Built on the Messiah Engine, Where Winds Meet scales up well for a maxed out PC experience at 4K - with some highlights in its open world design. We run through the best bits using an RTX 4080-equipped system, while also taking a look at the ray tracing and PSSR features on PS5 Pro. 

Visit the new Digital Foundry website: https://www.digitalfoundry.net

Go here to check out DF merch! https://store.digitalfoundry.net

Subscribe for more Digital Foundry: http://bit.ly/DFSubscribe

00:00 Introduction
02:11 Open World Highlights
05:26 Motion Capture Tech in Combat
08:32 PS5 Pro Comparisons
10:04 Conclusion
title: Where Winds Meet: PC/PS5 Pro Tech Breakdown + Ray Tracing Tested [Sponsored]
